attributes.action: Stop MPs and councillors sleeping/not turning up!
attributes.additional_details: Seen on news on regular basis. As well as no show of councillors in meeting!
attributes.background:
Why do MPs fall asleep in parliament?! 
Why don’t councillers turn up to meeting?!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

If there is a specific action you would like the Government or Parliament to take, you could start a new petition asking for this to happen.
